longBusinessSummary: Hertz Energy Inc. engages in the acquisition, exploration, and development of mineral properties in the United States, Canada, and Brazil. It primarily explores for lithium deposits. The company holds interest in the Lucky Mica project comprises 114 mineral claims covering an area of approximately 939 hectares located in the Arizona Pegmatite Belt in the Maricopa County, Arizona; and the AC/DC project that consists of 26,500 hectares located in the renowned James Bay Lithium District in Quebec, Canada. It also has an option agreement to acquire 100% interests in the Patriota Lithium project includes 2,963 hectares located in the Eastern Brazilian Pegmatite Province in Minas Gerais, Brazil; and the Cominco Uranium property located in Nunavut, Canada. The company was formerly known as Hertz Lithium Inc. and changed its name to Hertz Energy Inc. in February 2024. Hertz Energy Inc. was incorporated in 2019 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.

companyOfficers.name: Ms. Zahara  Kanji-Aquino CPA, CGA, CPA
companyOfficers.title: CFO & Corporate Secretary
